item.title: Lisa add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Jika kau menginginkan sesuatu, maka seluruh alam semesta akan bersatu membantumu." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself." -- Rick Riordan

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Alexandra Adornetto
item.description: "That is when you need faith the most. Not when everything is going your way, not when you have much to be thankful for, but when there is darkness all around." -- Alexandra Adornetto

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Alexandra Adornetto
item.description: "You make me feel things, Beth. That´s why you have to stay. Hell´s whole lot brighter with you in it." -- Alexandra Adornetto

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Alexandra Adornetto
item.description: "A body is merely a vehicle. The deepest emotions are experienced through the soul." -- Alexandra Adornetto

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Tahereh Mafi
item.description: "All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart." -- Tahereh Mafi

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Only a fool is never afraid, Frank. Heroes are the people who carry on despite their fear, because they know the job’s got to get done" -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "I think we make our own luck. Our parents give us life, but what we do with that life is our own responsibility." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "I want it to be better than okay. You deserve better than okay." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "You're full of contradictions, Ms. Wallace." I looked up at him and arched a brow. "I'm a girl. That's part of the job description, Mr. Maxfield." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description:
"Ugh! Erin. You have a one-track mind."
She smiled deviously. "I prefer to think of it as target-driven." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "Erin was right. Apologies could come too late." -- Tammara Webber
